title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Sarah and Jeff
description:
Sarah shares her story and then she and Jeff discuss encounters with God, windows for encountering meaning, and the hope that the suffering and pain we see and experience in life will reach and exceed a point of satisfactory resolution.

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
